SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT A.AcctCode,A.AcctName,A.ActType,A.Advance NB,A.FatherNum,A.Postable,A.ActCurr,A.Levels, A.Counter,A.Fixed,B.AcctName,[description] GroupAcc,G.ENDING_13 FROM oact a LEFT JOIN oact b (NOLOCK) ON B.AcctCode=A.FatherNum LEFT JOIN sys_gcm (NOLOCK) ON condition='ACCTYPE' AND GCM_ID=A.AcctStrLe LEFT JOIN ( SELECT G1.CO_ID, G1.BR_ID, G1.FISCAL_YEAR, G1.CURR_ID, G1.ACCOUNT_NO, SUM(G1.ENDING_13) AS ENDING_13 FROM GL_BALANCE G1 (NOLOCK) GROUP BY G1.CO_ID, G1.BR_ID, G1.FISCAL_YEAR, G1.CURR_ID, G1.ACCOUNT_NO ) G ON G.CO_ID=':1' AND G.BR_ID=':2' AND G.FISCAL_YEAR=:3 AND G.CURR_ID=':4' AND G.ACCOUNT_NO=A.AcctCode WHERE :5 and A.AcctStrLe=:6 and (A.FrozenFor=':7' or ':7'='') ORDER BY A.AcctCode

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,18}) OR {0,18} = '', '(UPPER(A.AcctCode) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,1})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR UPPER(A.AcctName) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,1})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')', '(UPPER(A.FatherNum) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,18})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR UPPER(B.AcctName) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,18})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.AcctCode,a.AcctName,a.FatherNum,b.AcctName, c.Description from oact a left join oact b (nolock) on b.AcctCode=a.FatherNum left join sys_gcm c (nolock) on condition='ACCTYPE' AND GCM_ID=a.AcctStrLe left join ( select G1.CO_ID, G1.BR_ID, G1.FISCAL_YEAR, G1.CURR_ID, G1.ACCOUNT_NO, sum(G1.ENDING_13) as ENDING_13 from GL_BALANCE G1 (nolock) GROUP BY G1.CO_ID, G1.BR_ID, G1.FISCAL_YEAR, G1.CURR_ID, G1.ACCOUNT_NO ) G ON G.CO_ID=':1' AND G.BR_ID=':2' AND G.FISCAL_YEAR=:3 AND G.CURR_ID=':4' AND G.ACCOUNT_NO=A.AcctCode where :5 and a.AcctStrLe=:6 and (a.FrozenFor=':7' or ':7'='') order by a.AcctCode

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({2,18}) OR {2,18} = '', '(UPPER(A.AcctCode) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({2,1})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR UPPER(A.AcctName) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({2,1})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')', '(UPPER(A.FatherNum) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({2,18})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR UPPER(B.AcctName) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({2,18})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')')
MlsTrans('This Account can not be delete')
IF ({0,22}<>'Y',MlsTrans('This Account is not Postable'),MlsTrans('Number Of Sub Account not zero'))
(NOT ISNULL({0,12}) AND Trim({0,12})<>'') AND NOT {0,13} AND LastClicked ()<>'Close'
MlsTrans('Account No must different with Parent Account')
{0,4} <> '' AND Trim({0,4}) <> Trim({0,2}) AND {0,43} AND LastClicked() <> 'Close'
MlsTrans('Do You want to close this windows ?')
MlsTrans('Account No must different with Parent Account')
(Trim({0,28})='' OR ISNULL({0,28})) AND (NOT ISNULL({0,26}) AND Trim({0,26})<>'')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.AcctCode,a.AcctName,a.ActType,a.Advance NB,a.FatherNum,a.Postable,a.ActCurr,a.Levels,a.Counter,a.Fixed,b.AcctName,[description] GroupAcc,G.ENDING_13 from oact a left join oact b (nolock) on b.AcctCode=a.FatherNum left join sys_gcm (nolock) on condition='ACCTYPE' AND GCM_ID=a.AcctStrLe LEFT JOIN GL_BALANCE G (nolock) ON G.CO_ID=':1' AND G.BR_ID=':2' AND G.FISCAL_YEAR=:3 AND G.CURR_ID=':4' AND G.ACCOUNT_NO=A.AcctCode where (upper(a.AcctCode) like '%:5%' or upper(a.AcctName) like '%:5%') and a.AcctStrLe=:6 and (a.FrozenFor=':7' or ':7'='') order by a.AcctCode
